title: Astronomers spot wobbling jets on rare interstellar comet 3I/ATLAS
description: Interstellar comet 3I/ATLAS is revealing surprising details about its journey. Scientists observed unusual, wobbling jet-like features in its sun-facing anti-tail, suggesting a rotation period of about 15.5 hours. This offers a rare glimpse into the behaviour of a pristine object from another star system reacting to solar heat for the first time, aiding our understanding of planetary formation elsewhere.

title: This day, that year: Dec 27, 1911 — When ‘Jana Gana Mana’ was sung in Calcutta
description: Rabindranath Tagore's patriotic song, 'Jana Gana Mana' was sung publicly for the first time at a 1911 Congress session. It ultimately evolved into becoming India's National Anthem. Initially met with controversy regarding its inspiration, Tagore clarified it honored a timeless guiding spirit, not a monarch. Adopted in 1950 as the national anthem, "Jana Gana Mana" became a unifying national voice.

title: Gastroparesis vs irritable bowel syndrome: Key differences, symptoms and treatments
description: Digestive woes like gastroparesis and IBS, though distinct, cause similar discomfort. Gastroparesis slows stomach emptying, leading to nausea and early fullness. IBS impacts the intestines with cramps and bowel changes. Understanding their unique origins, symptoms, and triggers is vital for effective management and improved well-being through diet, lifestyle, and medical interventions.

description: Doctors demand reinstatement of Dr. Narula and a transparent, time-bound and impartial inquiry into the incident

title: Shimla hospital assault: Himachal medical services hit as doctors go on strike
description: Resident doctors in Himachal Pradesh have launched an indefinite strike, halting non-emergency medical services across government hospitals. The protest follows the termination of a doctor accused of assaulting a patient, leading to significant hardship for patients, especially those from remote areas. Medical bodies are backing the doctor, demanding his reinstatement and a fair inquiry.

title: 15-year wait over! England beat Australia in chaotic fourth Test at MCG
description: England secured a crucial four-wicket victory in the fourth Ashes Test at the Melbourne Cricket Ground, marking their first win on Australian soil in 15 years. The match concluded within two days, with England chasing down a target of 175 to restore pride and build confidence for the final Test.

title: 'Scolded over AI use during exam': Class 10 student dies by suicide in Greater Noida West
description: A 16-year-old student tragically died by suicide after allegedly being reprimanded by teachers for using AI on her phone during pre-Board exams. Her father has filed a police complaint accusing the Greater Noida school of abetment to suicide. The school principal stated the student was informed of potential suspension for cheating, denying harassment.

This detailed calendar includes notification dates, application deadlines, exam commencement dates, and duration for all major examinations and recruitment tests, helping candidates stay organized, focused, and fully prepared for success in 2026.

description: Popular vedic speaker and harikatha exponent Dushyant Sridhar talks about the essence of spirituality, how he cites modern examples when he talks about ancient scriptures and his journey as a storyteller so far. He also explains why he appears on advertisements, and why he walked the ramp during a recent fashion event in Chennai that celebrated classical musicians. Dushyant also talks about the trips he puts together for yatris; in 2026, he has Kerala, Cambodia and Egypt on the list.

title: 'Issues with Ram': Anurag Thakur jibes opp over VB-GRAM-G; predicts Cong''century of defeats'

description: India is determined to bring back all fugitives wanted for prosecution. The Ministry of External Affairs spokesperson Randhir Jaiswal confirmed ongoing talks with multiple governments for extradition. Delays in cases like Vijay Mallya and Lalit Modi are due to complex legalities. India remains committed to ensuring these individuals face trial in Indian courts.

title: Protest outside HC against bail given to former MLA in Unnao rape case
Delhi homicide: Man kills wife for refusing to give Rs 20; later dies by suicide
description: A Delhi man allegedly strangled his wife during a dispute over a small sum of money before taking his own life by jumping in front of a train. Police initially faced conflicting accounts from the family, but an autopsy confirmed homicide. Investigations are ongoing into the husband's potential addiction and state of mind.

title: 'Under influence of alcohol': Fashion designer harassed in Bengaluru Metro
description: A fashion designer reported harassment on the Bengaluru Metro. The incident occurred near Vidhana Soudha Metro Station. Metro security detained the accused man. Police registered a non-cognisable report and issued a warning. The man was allegedly under the influence of alcohol. The woman later posted a video of the incident online.

title: 'Forced to spend Rs 40 lakh on reception': Newlywed woman dies by suicide in Bengaluru
description: A 26-year-old newlywed woman, Ganavi, died after allegedly attempting suicide, with her family accusing her husband and his relatives of dowry harassment. The family staged a protest at the husband's home after her death, demanding the arrest of his family members. Police have registered a dowry death case and are searching for the absconding accused.

title: What to do with house & car in US while stuck in India waiting for H-1B approval?
Between two Indias: Life on the 2025 feed
description: In 2025, the Indian "scroll" is a journey through two worlds on one screen: a filtered India of aesthetic luxury and a raw India of everyday labor. As affordable data and smartphones bring 500 million users online—mostly from Tier-2 and Tier-3 cities—the distance between these lives has collapsed.

title: 'Everyone is Indian': Viral video of 'Amazon Christmas party' in Canada triggers row
FaZe Clan faces major shake-up as five top streamers announce exits
description: Several well-known Twitch streamers have officially left FaZe Clan. The announcements were made on December 25, 2025. Along with Stable Ronaldo, four other members confirmed they were no longer part of FaZe Clan. Rani “Stable Ronaldo” was the first to confirm his exit through a post on X. Soon after, other members followed with similar messages. Their announcements were brief but emotional in tone.

title: Brittany Mahomes shifts focus as Patrick Mahomes earns praise off the field
description: NFL titans Robert Kraft and Gayle Benson, both billionaires, showcase contrasting paths to sports ownership. Kraft built a vast empire through diverse investments before acquiring the Patriots, while Benson inherited and expanded her late husband's franchises, the Saints and Pelicans. Their financial journeys highlight distinct strategies for wealth accumulation and franchise management.

title: Google CEO shares AI-made Xmas photo: Elon Musk reacts; post goes viral
description: Google CEO Sundar Pichai's AI-generated Christmas greeting featuring himself and his dog, Jeffree, in a custom snow globe image, garnered significant attention on X.

title: 'Save us, open borders': Hindus send SOS from B'desh; attacks on minorities rising
description: Hindus in Bangladesh are pleading with India to open its borders, fearing escalating violence and persecution following recent lynchings.  Concerns are heightened by the potential return of a hardline BNP leader, with minorities feeling trapped and vulnerable.  Activists criticize Indian Hindu organizations for inaction, warning of a potential 'holocaust' if borders remain closed.
